name: OE: L'oeuf dans l'eau - Beautiful egg
name_original: OE: L'oeuf dans l'eau - Beautiful egg
description:
Œ : L'oeuf dans l'eau - Beautiful egg

A short minimalist top-down turn-based almost-RPG, with a beautiful scroll style.

A princess undertakes a sacred quest to bring a mysterious beautiful egg to its hatching shrine.

How to play :

  • -ZQSD : move, attack

Œ is opensource : https://github.com/c-illy/BeautifulEgg

Team-made in Créajeu-Ascreb club. Coded in C++ with SFML. Drawn and animated by ourselves. www.ascreb.org

(Game short but complete - only a few cutscene images are still placeholders, any help welcomed ^^ )
